name: Manual Manny!
description:
All the best skaters in town can bust out a manual, why can't you? Your name is Manny, a dorky kid who just wants to be a RAD SKATER. Master your manual skills and become the BEST skater in the city!

"Manual Manny!" is the latest in Nintendo GAMEBOY skateboarding technology, keep Manny steady for as long as possible before you inevitably WIPE OUT! You can also move Manny around to collect all the letters of SKATE to get a RADICAL point bonus!

**Controls**: 

Gameboy: Left D-pad or B button for left movement, and Right D-pad or A button for right movement.

Emulator: Map controls to your preference! 

***IMPORTANT***

This game is a real deal Gameboy ROM! So using an emulator or Gameboy flash cart will be required for play! We recommend the BGB emulator, we used it for all our debugging and testing so it *should* work!

**Credits**:

Programming: @ghost-in-the-toast @buggyspaghetti

Music: @Conduit

Artwork: @Skawly

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/manual-manny
